setup.name: Setup & Foundation
setup.description: Initial project setup, dependencies, and configuration

testing.name: Testing & Validation
testing.description: Comprehensive testing, validation, and quality assurance

polish.name: Polish & Refinement
polish.description: UX improvements, optimization, and release preparation

maintenance.name: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Bug fixes, updates, and ongoing support

tasks.title: CAAMP v0.1.0 - Initial Release
tasks.description: Initial release of CAAMP as @cleocode/caamp on npm. Includes unified provider registry (28 providers), MCP server management, skills management, instructions injection, and library API for programmatic usage.

tasks.title: Implement unified provider registry with 28 AI coding agent definitions
tasks.description: Created src/core/registry/providers.ts with getAllProviders, getProvider, resolveAlias, getProvidersByPriority, and providers/ directory with 28 YAML provider definitions.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:10:26Z] 28 providers in registry. Tests in tests/unit/registry.test.ts (14 tests).

tasks.title: Implement provider auto-detection engine
tasks.description: Created src/core/registry/detection.ts with detectProvider, detectAllProviders, getInstalledProviders, detectProjectProviders. Supports binary, directory, appBundle, and flatpak detection methods.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:10:34Z] Detection works for all 28 providers via multiple methods.

tasks.title: Implement config format handlers (JSON/JSONC, YAML, TOML)
tasks.description: Created src/core/formats/ with json.ts, yaml.ts, toml.ts, utils.ts, and index.ts router. JSONC preserves comments via jsonc-parser. Includes readConfig, writeConfig, deepMerge, setNestedValue, getNestedValue, ensureDir.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:10:42Z] 18 tests in tests/unit/formats.test.ts covering all formats.

tasks.title: Implement MCP server config installer with format transforms
tasks.description: Created src/core/mcp/installer.ts with installMcpServer, installMcpServerToAll, buildServerConfig. Created src/core/mcp/transforms.ts for provider-specific config transformations (Goose YAML, Zed JSON, etc).

tasks.title: Implement lock file management for MCP servers and skills
tasks.description: Created src/core/mcp/lock.ts and src/core/skills/lock.ts sharing ~/.agents/.caamp-lock.json. Tracks installations, versions, selected agents.

tasks.title: Implement skills installer, discovery, validator, and audit scanner
tasks.description: Created src/core/skills/ with installer.ts (canonical + symlink model), discovery.ts (parseSkillFile, discoverSkills), validator.ts (Agent Skills standard validation), and audit/scanner.ts (security scanning with SARIF output).
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:11:08Z] Skills install, remove, discover, validate, scan, and toSarif all working.

tasks.title: Implement source parser for GitHub/npm/URL/local/command sources
tasks.description: Created src/core/sources/parser.ts with parseSource and isMarketplaceScoped. Classifies inputs as remote, package, command, github, gitlab, or local.

tasks.title: Implement instructions injection system for agent config files
tasks.description: Created src/core/instructions/injector.ts and templates.ts. Supports inject, checkInjection, removeInjection, checkAllInjections, injectAll with CLEO-style marker blocks.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:11:28Z] Injection system handles CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, GEMINI.md and all provider instruction files.

tasks.title: Implement marketplace client for skill discovery
tasks.description: Created src/core/marketplace/client.ts with MarketplaceClient class for searching and fetching skills from the marketplace API.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:11:36Z] Client supports search, list, and fetch operations.

tasks.title: Implement CLI with commander.js command structure
tasks.description: Created src/cli.ts and src/commands/ with providers (list, search), mcp (install, list, remove, detect), skills (install, remove, list, validate, audit), instructions (inject, check, remove), and marketplace commands.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:11:45Z] Full CLI with interactive prompts via @clack/prompts.

tasks.title: Create src/core/mcp/reader.ts with library API for MCP read/list/remove
tasks.description: NEW file: src/core/mcp/reader.ts with resolveConfigPath, listMcpServers, listAllMcpServers, removeMcpServer. Extracted from CLI commands into reusable core functions.
